message: Let's make a deal quickly. Take this offer or the pot shrinks!
Alice, let's be reasonable. This offer ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at the value.

Alice, this is getting us nowhere. A 50/50 split is the fairest option. Let's end this before inflation eats up even more.
